column2: "You look like you've been working hard! Do you have something I can reference for my rabbity movement?"
"This enemy data will show me how to move energetically? Let's take a look..."
"...I see. They have a lot of wild energy behind their movements. Is this really how a rabbit acts...?"
"I'll do my best to copy this! If I stay active and jump nice and high, it should get the idea across!"
"Anyway, thanks for helping me! I'm feeling really great about this performance!"
